pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Tidymodels Extension for Time Series Modeling // The time series forecasting framework for use with the 'tidymodels' ecosystem. Models include ARIMA, Exponential Smoothing, and additional time series models from the 'forecast' and 'prophet' packages. Refer to "Forecasting Principles Practice, Second edition" (https://otexts.com/fpp2/). Refer to "Prophet: forecasting at scale" (https://research.facebook.com/blog/2017/02/prophet- forecasting-at-scale/.).
